channel.title: Andrea Bocelli on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Andrea Bocelli on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Grace for the World: Disney+, Hulu and ABC News’ Vatican Concert Adds Jennifer Hudson, BamBam to Lineup (Exclusive)
item.description: The historic free concert, set to be streamed live from St. Peter’s Square, will feature Pharrell Williams, Andrea Bocelli, John Legend, Karol G, Clipse, Teddy Swims and Jelly Roll.
